summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2264, for the improvement of the alley in block 20, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 2, being the alley from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street, between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and paving the same, under Ordinance No. 23101 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
